epidemicProtocol.control

Class MessageEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • epidemicProtocol.control.MessageEntry

  • public class MessageEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    Structure of the messages that will be stored in the MessagesHistory. The message have two possible status: MessageStatus.INFECTIVE and MessageStatus.REMOVED. It starts in the MessageStatus.INFECTIVE status, and when it has more than epidemicProtocol.control.MessageEntry#MAX_NEGATIVE_COUNT of rejections the status change to MessageStatus.REMOVED. A rejection occur when another computer sends a negative reply to the local SpreadServer.

      • addNegativeSendCount

        public void addNegativeSendCount()
        Increases the rejection count of this message. When this count exceeds epidemicProtocol.control.MessageEntry#MAX_NEGATIVE_COUNT the status of the message is changed to MessageStatus.REMOVED.
